title: Vockets - Women's Hidden Pocket Seamless Underwear - for Phones, Credit Cards
features: TWO HIDDEN POCKETS - Our fabulous panties for women will keep your secret stash safe! Front and back pockets will keep your stuff secure between two layers of fabric.
PICKPOCKET PROOF CLOTHING - Perfect for holding a cell phone or a cash stash on nights out or use as travel underwear/money belt for travel. Use for other valuables and as an insulin pump holder.

NO VISIBLE PANTY LINE (VPL) - Our seamless, light compression panties are elastic-free and so discreet, that no one will even know you're wearing them! Low rise and moderate coverage. Excellent to pair with skinny jeans or leggings.

POLYESTER/SPANDEX PANTIES - 78% Polyester, 12% Spandex blend for ultimate comfort. Sizing: XS fits waist 22-24", rise 9" hip 24-26" - S waist 24-26" rise 9 3/8" hip 28-30" - M waist 26-28" rise 9 3/4" hip 30-32" - L waist 28-30" rise 10 1/8" hips 32-34" - XL waist 30-34" rise 10 1/2" hips 34-36" -

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED. We stand by our Vockets. If for any reason you are not happy with your Vockets product, just send us a message and we will take care of you. Care instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Wash with like colors. Tumble dry low. Do not dry clean. Do not bleach or iron.
description: Patent pending Panty Vocket. A panty with two hidden pockets (one in the front and one in the back) to hold your cell phone hands-free. Tuck your cell phone safely between two layers of fabric right at the waistline of your panty. Ideal for wearing with leggings or skirts or skinny jeans. Your phone is protected from falling and you’ll always stay connected!
Two convenient pockets, one in the front and one in the back. Accommodates most cell phones

Material: 78% polyester, 12% spandex, cotton gusset
Material: 78% polyester, 12% spandex, cotton gusset
Care: machine wash cold gentle cycle, wash with like colors, tumble dry low, do not dry clean, bleach or iron.
Care: machine wash cold gentle cycle, wash with like colors, tumble dry low, do not dry clean, bleach or iron.
